CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 给；交给；赠送；赠与；送给；提供；供给；捐赠；支付；付款；将（时间、精力等）用于；举办；举行；表演；公开进行；允许；使产生（某种感觉）；使拥有（某一特性）；生产；引起；打（电话）；告诉；说出；说明；评定（等级）；注入；让步；妥协；裁定；判；使受…惩罚；预计将持续（时间）
弹性；伸展性；适应性；灵活性；顺应性；柔韧性；伸缩性

synonym.mean: 捐赠；面向；有弹性；气候转暖

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 给；赠送（give的ing形式）；付出；产生

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指授予称号或学位等。
指正式地给予或授予，通常伴有仪式进行。
指捐赠大量的钱作基金，也可指给予非物质的东西。
多指出于慷慨、怜悯或正义感而给予，并且通常是在被请求下给予。
最普通用词，泛指将自己的东西给予他人，所给予的东西，物质或非物质的均可。
通常暗示所给予的东西是接受者应得的，而且给予者往往是具有裁判权力的。
侧重所给予的是应得的或是恰当的，或是因某种原因而适于接受的。
正式用词，指把某物作为礼物赠送于某人，也可作引申用。

word_group.brief_definition: 颁发；(体育比赛)处于劣势；泄露, 泄密
做演讲；发表一个演讲；发表一个讲话
发出, 散发出, 放射出
允许（某种情绪、意见或观点）得以表达；允许（人；集团）表达情绪
给建议, 指导, 给出指示
相互让步；妥协；做出让步

list.abstract: give（英 [ɡɪv]，美 [ɡɪv]），英语单词，作动词为给；递给；使有。作名词为弯曲或变形的能力；弹性；灵活性。短语搭配有give birth to（生育）。例句为“Choose one good quality of pigs and give some examples to prove it.（选择一种质量好的猪，并举例证明。）” give相关近义词有award、effect等，相关反义词有take、starve等。

yingyinNormal.en: Give daddy the Barbie. Ben, give, give me the Barbie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把芭比给爸爸，芭比给我。

yingyinNormal.en: Give me the bottle. Get me the towel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把奶瓶给我，把毛巾给我。

yingyinNormal.en: How is this yours to give?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为何会轮到你来给我们？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies》

yingyinNormal.en: Never mind. Give me the ball.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没事了，把球给我。

yingyinNormal.en: Give me those damn Pringles.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把该死的品客薯片给我。

yingyinNormal.en: Give me your gun, El Lazo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把你的枪给我，埃尔·拉佐。

yingyinNormal.en: Nasty. Give Daddy some sugar!
yingyinNormal.zh: 恶心吧唧！给爷一点掌声！

yingyinNormal.en: I'll give you guys some privacy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我给你们一点隐私吧。

yingyinNormal.en: All right. So, just give me a call.
yingyinNormal.zh: 记得打电话给我。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, why don't you give him a call?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你何不打给他？

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe he didn't give you a chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许他没有给你机会说。

yingyinNormal.en: You mean before you give it to me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说在你"给我"之前吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You know, there is nothing I couldn't give you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我什么都能给你。

yingyinNormal.en: Why did you give your credit card to Joey?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么把你的卡给乔伊？

yingyinNormal.en: No, you can't. Let me see it. Give it here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不行。让我看看，给我。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I'll give you a call tomorrow sometime...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我明天会给你电话的。

yingyinNormal.en: Give me one reason why I should listen to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给我一个听信你的理由。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'll give you a nickel's worth of free advice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再给你个免费忠告。

yingyinNormal.en: You could give it to me. Just a suggestion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以给我啊，建议一下而已。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water》

yingyinNormal.en: The application in your hand. Give it to her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是说你手里的申请表，给她。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (give away)赠送; 泄露; 失去
屈从; 妥协; (give in)认输

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 给；递给；使有；提供；做；产出；给予…应得的；承认…适用于；说出；让步；变形

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 颁发；(体育比赛)处于劣势；泄露；泄密

sense_info_list.en: to provide somebody with something

examination_example.sentence: This step may sound overly deferential, but it's a smart way to <highlight>give</highlight> the powerful person psychological safety and control.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一步可能听起来过于恭敬，但这是给有权势的人心理安全和控制的聪明方法。

examination_example.sentence: Next, the researchers trapped the robots in cages and <highlight>gave</highlight> the rats the opportunity to release them by pressing a lever.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接下来，研究人员将机器人困在笼子里，并给老鼠通过按压杠杆释放它们的机会。

examination_example.sentence: Even so, employers complain they aren't <highlight>given</highlight> all the workers they need.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即便如此，雇主抱怨他们没有得到所需的全部工人。

sense_info_list.en: used with a noun to describe a particular action, giving the same meaning as the related verb

examination_example.sentence: Critically, another group was asked to spend a minute writing down reasons for their judgment, before <highlight>giving</highlight> the rating.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关键是，另一组被要求花一分钟的时间写下他们判断的理由，然后再进行评分。

examination_example.sentence: Suppose you are invited by Professor Williams to <highlight>give</highlight> a presentation about Chinese culture to a group of international students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 假设你受威廉姆斯教授邀请给一群国际学生做一个关于中国文化的报告。

examination_example.sentence: Its lawmakers <highlight>gave</highlight> preliminary approval last week to a law that would make it a crime to employ ultra-thin models on runways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周，其立法者初步通过了一项法律，规定聘用过于瘦弱的模特走T台为犯罪行为。

sense_info_list.en: to use time, energy, etc. for somebody or something

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Give</highlight> top priority to professional training
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把专业培训放在首位

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Give</highlight> priority to childcare outside the home
examination_example.sentence_trans: 优先考虑家庭之外的儿童保育

examination_example.sentence: The Conservatives' planning reform explicitly <highlight>gives</highlight> rural development priority over conservation, even authorising "off-plan" building where local people might object.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 保守党的规划改革明确将乡村发展置于乡村保护之上，甚至批准了可能受到当地居民反对的“计划外”建筑。

sense_info_list.en: to pay money to a charity, etc., to help people

examination_example.sentence: In 2007, Indonesia started phasing in a program that <highlight>gives</highlight> money to its poorest residents under certain conditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2007年，印度尼西亚开始分阶段实施一项计划，该计划在特定条件下给最贫困的居民捐款。

examination_example.sentence: Increasing corporate <highlight>giving</highlight> by about 20% results in fines that generally are 40% lower than the typical punishment for bribing foreign officials.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将企业捐赠增加约20%，导致罚款金额通常比贿赂外国官员的典型处罚低40%。

examination_example.sentence: Buying gifts or <highlight>giving</highlight> to charity is often more pleasurable than purchasing things for oneself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 买礼物或捐给慈善机构通常比给自己买东西更令人愉快。

sense_info_list.zh: (give away)赠送; 泄露; 失去

examination_example.sentence: Americans buy roughly 20 billion garments a year and no matter how much they <highlight>give</highlight> away, this excess leads to waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国人每年大约购买200亿件服装，无论他们赠送多少，这种过剩都会导致浪费。

sense_info_list.en: to stop doing or having something

examination_example.sentence: The web's full of articles offering tips on making time to read: "<highlight>Give</highlight> up TV" or "Carry a book at all times."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 网络上充斥着提供腾出时间阅读的技巧性文章：“放弃电视”或“随时带本书”。

examination_example.sentence: Second, paper checks have the advantage that they provide receipts, something that many consumers are unwilling to <highlight>give</highlight> up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其次，纸质支票的优点是提供收据，这是许多消费者不愿放弃的。

sense_info_list.en: to agree to change your mind or give up some of your demands
sense_info_list.zh: 屈从; 妥协; (give in)认输

examination_example.sentence: a <highlight>give</highlight>-in to governmental pressure
examination_example.sentence_trans: 屈服于政府压力

examination_example.sentence: When we are deprived of green, of plants, of trees, most of us <highlight>give</highlight> in to a demoralization of spirit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们失去绿色，植物和树木时，我们中的大多数人都会深陷于精神萎靡的状态。

sense_info_list.en: hand over to be kept

examination_example.sentence: The federal government is <highlight>giving</highlight> responsibility for managing the bird to the same industries that are pushing it to extinction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 联邦政府将管理这种鸟的责任交给了那些将其推向灭绝的行业。

sense_info_list.en: to produce a particular feeling in somebody

examination_example.sentence: may <highlight>give</highlight> its readers a sense of achievement
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可能会给读者带来一种成就感。

examination_example.sentence: The most commonly-accepted definition says this generation was born after 1995, <highlight>give</highlight> or take a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最普遍接受的定义是，这代人出生在1995年之后，前后误差不超过一年。

sense_info_list.en: to judge somebody or something to be of a particular standard

examination_example.sentence: AT&T is often <highlight>given</highlight> as the gold standard of a company who decided to do a massive reskilling program.
examination_example.sentence_trans: AT&T经常被认为是决定进行大规模再培训计划的公司的典范。

sense_info_list.en: cause to happen

examination_example.sentence: The growth of higher education manifests itself in at least three quite different ways, and these have <highlight>given</highlight> rise to different problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 高等教育的发展至少表现在三个截然不同的方面，而这些方面又引发了不同的问题。

sense_info_list.en: to perform something in public

examination_example.sentence: Plays aiming at literary distinction were written for the choir boys of the royal chapel, who, however, <highlight>gave</highlight> plays in public.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 旨在获得文学成就的戏剧是为皇家教堂的唱诗班男孩写的，然而，他们在公共场合演出。

sense_info_list.en: to hand sth to sb as a present; to allow sb to have sth as a present

examination_example.sentence: The other half focused on charitable <highlight>giving</highlight> instead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一半则专注于慈善捐赠。

sense_info_list.en: to predict that something will last a particular length of time
capacity to bend or alter in shape under pressure
pay someone a particular amount
sentence someone to a specified penalty

word_usage.usage: give作及物动词时可接名词或代词作宾语，也可接双宾语，即give sth. to sb.或give sb. sth.。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 颁发；(体育比赛)处于劣势；泄露；泄密
给予访问权限；准许出入
把...贷给(某人)；把...归功于(某人)；认为当然有(某种性质等)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 给；递给；使有；提供；做；产出；给予…应得的；承认…适用于；说出；让步；变形

sense_info_list.en: cause or allow someone or something to have something, especially something abstract

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>gave</highlight> birth to the oil drilling industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它催生了石油钻探行业。

examination_example.sentence: They prove to be a good means for managers to <highlight>give</highlight> instructions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，它们是管理者给出指示的好方法。

examination_example.sentence: It can <highlight>give</highlight> rise to endless disputes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它会引发无休止的争端。

examination_example.sentence: Why does the speaker <highlight>give</highlight> credit to the world's agricultural scientists?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么演讲者称赞世界上的农业科学家？

examination_example.sentence: Suggesting that our values are more economically driven than we usually <highlight>give</highlight> them credit for.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 表明我们的价值观比我们通常认可的更受经济驱动。

sense_info_list.en: hand over to be kept

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Given</highlight> to you by a loved one, as clothes with fond associations can help you tap into constructive emotions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 爱人送给你的，有着美好联想的衣服可以帮助你挖掘建设性的情感。

examination_example.sentence: It has <highlight>given</highlight> rise to much controversy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这引起了很多争议。

sense_info_list.en: state or put forward information or argument

word_usage.usage: Give up smoking at once! 和 Give over smoking at once! 都是 "立刻戒烟! " 的意思
give是瞬间动词，其现在完成式不可与表示一段时间的状语连用。
give接双宾语时，间接宾语是物时，短语为give sb. sth.；当间接宾语是人时，双宾语短语需转化为give sth. to sb.。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重所给予的是应得的或是恰当的, 或是因某种原因而适于接受的。
通常暗示所给予的东西是接受者应得的, 而且给予者往往是具有裁判权力的。
正式用词, 指把某物作为礼物赠送于某人, 也可作引申用。
通常指授予称号或学位等。
指捐赠大量的钱作基金, 也可指给予非物质的东西。
最普通用词, 泛指将自己的东西给予他人, 所给予的东西, 物质或非物质的均可。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 做演讲；发表一个演讲；发表一个讲话
停止做某事；表示强烈的不同意或否认

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 赠品；赠与物；无意中的暴露；无意中暴露的事

word_family.mean: v. 给；递给；使有；提供；做；产出；给予…应得的；承认…适用于；说出；让步；变形

sense_info_list.en: cause or allow someone or something to have something; especially something abstract

examination_example.sentence: I could <highlight>give</highlight> you his phone number if you want, and you could call him and ask him questions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你愿意，我可以给你他的电话号码，你可以打电话问他问题。

examination_example.sentence: San Jose's officials are resolved to <highlight>give</highlight> poor kids access to the resources necessary for success in life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 圣荷西市的官员决心让贫困的孩子获得生活成功所必需的资源。

examination_example.sentence: It's like a way to <highlight>give</highlight> people joy, maybe spark something in them that can change them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就像是给人们带来快乐的一种方式，也许会激发他们身上的某种能改变自我的东西。

sense_info_list.en: produce or cause something

examination_example.sentence: Their thick, triangular hair reflects light like a prism (棱镜) , <highlight>giving</highlight> them a metallic reflection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们浓密的三角形毛发像棱镜一样反射光线，给他们一种金属般的倒影。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>gives</highlight> birth to several babies at a time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它一次生好几个孩子。

examination_example.sentence: The whales <highlight>give</highlight> birth off the Southeast Coast of America in the winter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些鲸鱼冬天在美国东南海岸分娩。

sense_info_list.en: hand over to be kept

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>gives</highlight> 5,000 yen, about 45 US dollars a month to those who rescue a cat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他每月给那些救助猫的人5000日元，约合45美元。

examination_example.sentence: She tried to <highlight>give</highlight> him money later on, but he graciously declined.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她后来试图给他钱，但他婉言谢绝了。

examination_example.sentence: He wanted the furniture store to <highlight>give</highlight> him a refund.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他想让家具店给他退款。

sense_info_list.en: carry out or perform a specified action

examination_example.sentence: If asked, most people will be able to <highlight>give</highlight> a vague description of their main meals: breakfast, lunch, dinner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果被问到这个问题，大多数人都能大致描述一下他们的主食：早餐、午餐、晚餐。

examination_example.sentence: In this study, students came into the laboratory and were asked to <highlight>give</highlight> a public speech in front of upper-year students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这项研究中，学生进入实验室，并且要在高年级学生面前发表公开演讲。

examination_example.sentence: Then they <highlight>gave</highlight> worse speeches and made more mistakes in math.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后他们发表了更糟糕的演讲，犯了更多的数学错误。

sense_info_list.en: concede defeat; concede or yield something as valid or deserved in respect of someone

examination_example.sentence: Farmers <highlight>give</highlight> up trying to earn a living from farming or herding.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 农民们放弃了试图通过耕作或放牧来谋生。

examination_example.sentence: I'm not advocating that you should <highlight>give</highlight> up your pursuit of having a fulfilling career and a thriving personal life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我并不是说你应该放弃追求有成就感的事业和繁荣的个人生活。

examination_example.sentence: No one is asking you to <highlight>give</highlight> up activities you like, but if you're watching food shows on TV, try cooking instead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有人要求你放弃你喜欢的活动，但是如果你在看电视上的美食节目，试着做饭。

sense_info_list.en: sentence someone to a specified penalty

word_usage.usage: Give up smoking at once! 和 Give over smoking at once! 都是 "立刻戒烟! " 的意思

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重所给予的是应得的或是恰当的，或是因某种原因而适于接受的。
通常暗示所给予的东西是接受者应得的，而且给予者往往是具有裁判权力的。
正式用词，指把某物作为礼物赠送于某人，也可作引申用。
通常指授予称号或学位等。
指捐赠大量的钱作基金，也可指给予非物质的东西。
最普通用词，泛指将自己的东西给予他人，所给予的东西，物质或非物质的均可。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 可引起；导致；使发生(或存在)
赠送；错失(机会等)；泄露(秘密等)
做演讲；发表一个演讲；发表一个讲话
分发；发出(光、热等)；发表；公布；用完；耗尽；(人体某一部分)不能正常工作；变得无力

sense_info_list.en: cause or allow someone or something to have something, especially something abstract

examination_example.sentence: If you have a membership card, I can <highlight>give</highlight> a 20% discount.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你有会员卡，我可以给你打八折。

examination_example.sentence: Mexicans may use silence when instructions are <highlight>given</highlight> by a person in authority.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当权威人士给出建议时，墨西哥人可能会保持沉默。

examination_example.sentence: My 17-year-old suggested <highlight>giving</highlight> him a gift card.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我17岁的孩子建议送他一张礼品卡。

examination_example.sentence: Many experts have <highlight>given</highlight> talks here that have focused on the medical care and the development of public services for senior citizens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多专家在这里做了演讲，重点是老年人的医疗保健和公共服务的发展。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>give</highlight> a talk
examination_example.sentence_trans: 做演讲

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>give</highlight> a lecture
examination_example.sentence_trans: 做演讲

examination_example.sentence: But Jeff's hand touched the hot burner and he <highlight>gave</highlight> a cry of pain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是杰夫的手碰到了灼热的火炉，他痛苦地叫了一声。

word_usage.usage:
give跟双宾语：
He gave me a book. =He gave a book to me.
他给了我一本书。

give和名词、动名词、某些表示活动的名词连用，表示一个动作或活动，有时跟一个宾语，有时跟双宾语：
He gave us great help. =We were given great help./Great help was given (to) us. 
他给了我们很大帮助。
They gave us a warm welcome. 
他们热烈欢迎我们。
give a concert/lessons/a song/a lecture/a good beating/a thorough cleaning 
开音乐会/授课/唱歌/作演讲/揍一顿/大扫除

give的过去分词given用作定语，表示“特定的”“一定的”：
Any given culture is a reflection of the politics and economics of a given society.
任何一种特定的文化都是某一特定社会的政治及经济情况的反映。

give引导短语作状语，表示“如果有”：
Given the opportunities, she might have become an outstanding artist.
给她机会，她或许会成为出色的艺术家。
Give up smoking at once! 和 Give over smoking at once! 都是 "立刻戒烟! " 的意思

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重所给予的是应得的或是恰当的，或是因某种原因而适于接受的。
通常暗示所给予的东西是接受者应得的，而且给予者往往是具有裁判权力的。
正式用词，指把某物作为礼物赠送于某人，也可作引申用。
通常指授予称号或学位等。
指捐赠大量的钱作基金，也可指给予非物质的东西。
最普通用词，泛指将自己的东西给予他人，所给予的东西，物质或非物质的均可。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 提出(论点; 建议; 情况)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 赠品；赠与物；无意中的暴露；无意中暴露的事

word_family.mean: v. 给；递给；使有；提供；做；产出；给予…应得的；承认…适用于；说出；让步；变形

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 颁发；(体育比赛)处于劣势；泄露；泄密
做演讲；发表演讲；发表讲话
允许（某种情绪、意见或观点）得以表达；允许（人；集团）表达情绪
举办音乐会；举行音乐会；开音乐会

sense_info_list.en: cause or allow someone or something to have something, especially something abstract

examination_example.sentence: The forest fires in Australia have <highlight>given</highlight> us warnings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 澳大利亚的森林大火给了我们警告。

examination_example.sentence: One day in fourth grade, our teacher <highlight>gave</highlight> us a project in class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 四年级的一天，老师在课堂上给我们布置了一个课题。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Given</highlight> more time, you could visit more places of interest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果有更多的时间，你可以参观更多的名胜古迹。

sense_info_list.en: hand over to be kept

examination_example.sentence: Nick <highlight>gave</highlight> his mother a scarf on her fortieth birthday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尼克在他母亲40岁生日时送了她一条围巾。

examination_example.sentence: So I can help the environment while <highlight>giving</highlight> something useful to people in need.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此我可以帮助（保护）环境，同时给需要帮助的人捐赠一些有用的东西。

examination_example.sentence: Despite the pain I felt that day, it was a gift they had <highlight>given</highlight> me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管那天我感到痛苦，但这是他们送给我的礼物。

sense_info_list.en: to stop doing or having sth

examination_example.sentence: So one day, he <highlight>gave</highlight> up his job and moved to a ranch (牧场) in Texas, making much less money as a cowboy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 于是有一天，他放弃了工作，搬到了得克萨斯州的一个牧场，当牛仔挣的钱少得多。

examination_example.sentence: To help stop the spread of coronavirus, people <highlight>give</highlight> up their usual greeting styles and invent safe ways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了阻止冠状病毒的传播，人们放弃了常用的问候方式，发明了安全的方式。

examination_example.sentence: Many times I thought about <highlight>giving</highlight> up, but I fought on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多次我都想放弃，但我奋力坚持了下来。

sense_info_list.en: carry out or perform a specified action

examination_example.sentence: Parents are welcome to watch the performance (演出) <highlight>given</highlight> by the children at the end of the course.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 欢迎家长在课程结束时观看孩子们的演出。

examination_example.sentence: The talk will be <highlight>given</highlight> on 18 December.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 会谈将于12月18日举行。

examination_example.sentence: It will be <highlight>given</highlight> by professor Li Ping from Peking University.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将由北京大学的李平教授发表（演讲）。

sense_info_list.en: state or put forward information or argument
sense_info_list.zh: 提出(论点; 建议; 情况)

examination_example.sentence: Could you <highlight>give</highlight> me some advice to improve my reading speed?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你能给我一些建议来提高我的阅读速度吗？

examination_example.sentence: And when they <highlight>give</highlight> their opinions, always encourage them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他们发表观点的时候，一直鼓励他们。

examination_example.sentence: My teacher has <highlight>given</highlight> me useful suggestions and I want to thank him from the bottom of my heart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的老师给了我一些有效的建议，我想从心底里感谢他。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Give</highlight> Mike a call.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 给迈克打个电话。

examination_example.sentence: "<highlight>Give</highlight> it a try, or <highlight>give</highlight> it up," Zhang believed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 张认为，“要么尝试，要么放弃”。

examination_example.sentence: I noticed Adam and Chen <highlight>give</highlight> each other the thumbs (大拇指) up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我注意到亚当和陈互相竖起了大拇指。

word_usage.usage: give是瞬间动词，其现在完成式不可与表示一段时间的状语连用。
give接双宾语时，间接宾语是物时，短语为give sb. sth.；当间接宾语是人时，双宾语短语需转化为give sth. to sb.。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最普通用词，泛指将自己的东西给予他人。所给予的东西，物质或非物质均可。
指正式地给予或授予，通常伴有仪式进行。
